column4: a word of warning, grep -q is a gnu specific extension for grep, so if you want your script to run on *bsd or solaris, you'd have to change it

Thanks for the advice :) Portable scripts are way beyond my scope right now (i'm just backing up my computer over rsync).  However, it's good to know if I ever want something to be truly cross-platform.
i only mentioned it because i got ripped apart on #solaris recently for inadvertantly using a gnu specific extention ;)
